resources.string: Hay! Here you can manage script.
Autostart type script, launches every game load
Invokable type script, launches thru CLEO menu

Download the game/cache from Google Play or on any other site, if you downloaded the cache - before unpacking it, install the CLEO apk. If you installed the game from Google Play - go to explorer and rename \"../Android/obb/com.rockstargames.gtasa\" to any other, let\'s say: com.rockstargames.gtasa1, then install the CLEO apk after installation, rename the folder back.
Download any CLEO script and go to the explorer along the path \"../Android/data/com.rockstargames.gtasa\" drop the CLEO script here and go to the game.
Imagine accessing a repository. Access to the repository is needed for the application to be able to work with script. Click \"SETTINGS > PERMISSIONS > STORAGE > ACCESS(ON)\".
The script may not work correctly or stop working altogether. Are you sure you want to save toy changes?
By watching ads, you support the developer to improve this product. You can turn off all ads by dropping support from the developer, or continue to watch ads and support the developer.
How to install the CLEO script
